item.title: Making Scoreboard Show Interface When Clicked On
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Xseil, post:2, topic:372884”]change

if(objectID == 3192){

to

case 3192:

then change your } to a break;[/quote]

OR TRY. objectid TO objectID remember java is case sensitive again… objectid to objectID

item.title: Making Scoreboard Show Interface When Clicked On
item.dc:creator: @Dhfhy1 Dhfhy1
item.description:
@Dhfhy1 wrote:

Hello all, Im trying to make it so when you click on the scoreboard in my game it shows up an interface showing all the mods/admins/and owner, I made the code and I get one error when compiling Please Help me Solve.

if(objectID == 3192){ showInterface(8134); sendQuest("Mods/Admins/Owners", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("-----------------------------------------------", 8147); sendQuest("Mods", 8148); sendQuest("-----------------------------------------------", 8149); sendQuest("spr334hell", 8150); sendQuest("", 8151); sendQuest("-----------------------------------------------", 8152); sendQuest("Admins", 8153); sendQuest("-----------------------------------------------", 8154); sendQuest("Infanticide", 8155); sendQuest("", 8156); sendQuest("-----------------------------------------------", 8157); sendQuest("Owners", 8158); sendQuest("-----------------------------------------------", 8159); sendQuest("Dope & Dopeman", 8160); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic
